question: Which two countries have launched a trial bus service between their capitals through India under the purview of BBIN Motor Vehicles Agreement?
explanation: Bangladesh and Nepal have launched a trial bus service between their capitals through India. The proposed commercial bus service comes under the purview of BBIN (Bangladesh-Bhutan-India-Nepal) Motor Vehicles Agreement. Currently, passengers use the Lalmonirhat-Burimari-Changrabandha-Siliguri route to go to Kathmandu.
